summary: This document consists of Bureau of Prisons count sheets, inmate rosters, and official count slips from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 2, 2019. It records inmate population counts by housing unit and includes a roster entry for an inmate assigned to 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' (Suicide or Unassigned) status. The documents are routine prison administrative forms for tracking inmate location and status.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine administrative count of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, with totals recorded by housing unit.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: Document date is August 2, 2019, from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
An inmate roster entry shows an assignment category of 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' (Suicide or Unassigned) for one inmate.
The total inmate count recorded across housing units was 766 inmates, later verified as 764.
These are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative forms for tracking inmate population and assignments.
No specific individuals are named in these administrative count sheets and rosters.
